argument: The only value that a program like TFA provides is to expose privileged, upper middle class young people to the realities of how the other side lives. Hopefully, these people can take this experience with them when they go on to their gilded careers in law, banking, and politics.

argument: Of course their salaries should be raised. But this should be separated from the discussion about legality. Salaries should be raised and only legal workers should be employed. Its really a no brainer. And any discussion about only Mexicans being prepared to do this work so it has to be illegal is completely disingenuous.
